Package kaninator.graphics

Interface Summary
Canvas An interface for a class that initializes a window and can draw to it
Drawable An interface for an element that can be drawn to a object which implements the Canvas interface.
 

Class Summary
Animation The class representing animations in the engine.
AnimationFactory The only way to create Animations.
Image A drawable image object.
ImageFactory The only way to create Images.
Screen Implements the Canvas interface with the Java2D library.
Shadow An object implementing the Drawable interface that basically draws a shadow.
Text A drawable text object.
VisibleElement An intermediate form of the visible objects Wraps the Drawable objects together with the on screen coordinates so they can be drawn by a Canvas object.
